name: Righty Tighty
description:
Hiya! Welcome to Righty Tighty, a puzzle game by me! The aim of the game is to tighten each and every bolt by rotating your wrench around them 360° in order to win the level. Try to beat all 12 levels and discover 5+ different types of bolts on the way! Enjoy!

The full version will release on itch.io sometime in the near future with 24+ levels.

• 12 increasingly difficult levels
• Fully-functional level select menu
• Control help menu (press "C" to open and close)
• In-game instructions
• 100% of art and code by me
• Idea by me

Menu music is from FreeSound.org
Main music is "Automation" by Step
Fonts from LingoJam.com
